settings.health_score_btn: Click here to unlock your Health Score
settings.health_score_popup:
Health Score

Your Health Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Your health score reflects your overall health status and provides a directional indicator on how your health is evolving. Using advanced technology and scientific data, we look at numerous factors in your life, including your demographics, health conditions, family history, diet and lifestyle habits, lab results, and DNA, and how they are impacting your health. Therefore, the more data you provide, the more accurate your health score and more customized your recommendations can be. Based on a scale of 0-100, a higher score is suggestive of better health. As you make positive health changes and improve your lab values, remember to update your health questionnaire so that your health score can reflect your progress.
settings.metabolic_score_btn: Click here to unlock your Metabolic Score
settings.metabolic_score_popup:
Metabolic Score

Your Metabolic Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Your metabolic score reflects a deep dive into the many factors that affect your cardiovascular health, including blood sugar balance, lipid levels, blood pressure, and BMI. Also factored in is your exposure to common environmental toxins that can cause metabolic disturbances. Calculated on a scale from 0 (higher risk) to 100 (lower risk), with the data you’ve provided, this score represents a snapshot of your current likelihood of developing heart disease, diabetes, or other cardiovascular issues. Your customized recommendations include key action steps for improving your cardiometabolic health.
settings.toxin_score_btn: Click here to unlock your Toxin Score
settings.toxin_score_popup:
Toxin Score

Your Toxin Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Based on a scale from 0 (higher risk) to 100 (lower risk), your toxin score is a calculation of your estimated exposure to environmental toxins, as well as your body’s unique ability to detoxify pollutants, chemicals and other toxins. This score factors in all the information you provided, including your answers to the health questionnaire, your lab values, DNA results, as well as data gathered from air and water quality in your area. You can work to improve your toxin score by making the recommended changes to your diet and lifestyle, which can help to reduce your exposure to toxins as well as enhance your detoxification pathways.
settings.dashboard_cont:
Welcome! Your dashboard is home base for your Humanized+ membership, and is the shopping portal for ordering super-discounted lab tests and supplements, as well as nutrition consultations.

In addition, Humanized+ provides a current data-based look at your health, plus customized recommendations and action steps to help you feel your best. Use this information to help you make better diet and lifestyle choices, target nutritional deficiencies, and learn about your toxin risk.

Science-based health solutions work best when you pinpoint as many contributing factors as possible. To keep your health dashboard accurate and get the most personalized recommendations, provide as much information as you can on the health questionnaire, and consider doing lab testing and DNA to add to your profile. Remember to revisit the health questionnaire every few months and have new lab work done annually, or as needed.
settings.unlock_personalized: Click here to unlock your personalized Top Recommendations
settings.unlock_personalized_popup:
Complete your Health Questions
Your Humanized+ Health Score gives you a baseline for the current state of your body. From there our cutting edge technology is able to assess what you need to improve your health and avoid potential problems. Personalized recommendations based on your eating habits, lifestyle choices, DNA, toxin exposure, vitamin and mineral deficiencies, blood sugar balance, inflammation levels, and other factors give you actionable steps to make positive changes.
